All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Body
This body interface represents a game object with dimension and basic forces
BodyImage
This is a class represent a body with image added
BodyRec
This is a class represent rectangular a body with javafx rectangle added
Camera
This class represents a camera so that the relative position of objects attached to this class can be moved
CameraView
This interface enables object to be moved by the camera
CollisionBodyImage
represents a body with image that can return collision data with other objects
CollisionBodyRec
represents a rectangular body that can return collision data with other objects
CollisionEvent
This class contains all the data after a collision
CollisionImage
represents a rectangular object that can return collision data with other objects
CollisionRec
represents a rectangular object that can return collision data with other objects
Controller
 
Drag
This class calculation the air drag that proportional to v^2
Enemy
represents the simple enemy object better known as the "goomba"
EnemyShell
represents the shell enemy object better known as the "koopa troopa"
Game
This class can initialize the game
GameObject
This class represent all the game object in the game It has all the data, including the position, velocity, acceleration and all forces applied on the object Each time the update method is call, it will calculate the relative position to the screen
GameObjectImage
This class represent s game object in the game with image added
GameObjectRec
This class represent s game object in the game with javafx rectangle added
Instructions
This class shows the instruction scene
InteractiveObjectImage
This represent a interactive object with image so that objects can collide with each other
InteractiveObjectRec
This represents a rectangular interactive object with javafx rectangular so that objects can collide with each other
KeyInput
This class is used to deal with key input
Kinetic
Kinetic interface Implemented in various other classes in order to add kinetic properties to objects Getter and setter methods for position, displacement, velocity, acceleration and mass
KineticsWithSize
This interface represents a rectangular object
Lavaball
It represents a lavaball
LevelSelection
This classed is used for level selection
Main
This class contains the main method that actually run the game
MovingPlatformImage
 
Mushroom
This class represents a mushroom so that the player can be powered up
PhysicsUpdate
This interface enable all gameObjects be called by the animation time to update
Platform
This represents a platform in the game
PlatformImage
This represents a platform with image in the game
PlatformImagePattern
This class represents a platform with repeating pattern
Player
represents the main player object
StartUp
This class shows the start up scene
Vector
This class represents a 2-D vector
